Daily Attendance

Tracking Attendance is used for a variety of operational, accountability and strategic purposes, and for educational research.


business

Policy-makers

The Legislation, Agreements, Authorising environment and objectives of Attendnace reporting.

Read this section to understand the national landscape of Attendnace Reporting, the motivations for reporting and the obligations and accountabilities of schools and school systems for that reporting.

group

Business Users

The business-level details of Attendance reporting at National, School-System and School levels.

Read this section to understand the detailed requirements of Attendance reporting, how those agreements differ across the country and in different sectors, and how duty of care provisions such as privacy are implemented.

settings

Developers

How to connect to SIF services for Attendnace data, to consume and to provide Attendance data.

Read this section to learn the details of using and testing SIF-based data exchange services for Attendnace reporting.

DSG National Use Cases

The DSG National Use Cases are a repository of policy, business and technical information that capture the nationally agreed what, why and how of core data exchanges.
